meanings.definition: Not inclined to fight or argue.
meanings.sent1: She remained uncombative during the disagreement.
meanings.sent2: The uncombative cat peacefully napped in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The uncombative puppy just wanted to play fetch all day.
meanings.sent4: His uncombative nature was like a calm lake on a windless day.
meanings.sent5: The uncombative atmosphere in the room was palpable.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of aggression or hostility.
meanings.sent1: The uncombative response helped de-escalate the situation.
meanings.sent2: The uncombative smile on her face put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent3: The uncombative handshake was surprisingly firm.
meanings.sent4: Her uncombative demeanor was a breath of fresh air in the office.
meanings.sent5: The uncombative tone of his voice was soothing.
